articles.title: Fully-vaccinated Americans have had looser restrictions for months. Why don't Canadians? - CTV News
articles.description: Americans who have been fully vaccinated are able to ditch masks and forget about distancing, but there is still no guidance for Canadians who have received both doses.
articles.content:
TORONTO -- 
It's been more than three months since the U.S. Centers for Disease Control (CDC) first told Americans what they can safely do once they are fully vaccinated.

articles.title: "Ring of Fire" Solar Eclipse Dazzles Skies of North America, North Pole - The Great Courses Daily News
articles.description: A near-total solar eclipse shone down on parts of North America Thursday. Solar eclipses occur in stages and show us rare parts of the Sun.
articles.content:
By Jonny Lupsha, Current Events Writer

articles.title: America's Cup sailing away from NZ for next regatta - RNZ
articles.description:
New Zealand's Cup looks set to sail elsewhere for its next battle. Team New Zealand is entering discussions with other nations keen to host the 37th America's Cup, after rejecting a multimillion-dollar offer of support from the government.

The deci…
articles.content:
Team New Zealand is ducking for cover after snubbing the government's multimillion-dollar offer of support to keep the America's Cup in Auckland.
